mutants.code:
from heapq import heappush, heappop, heapify

def minimize_delay_cost(n, k, costs):
    q = [(-costs[i], i) for i in range(k)]
    heapify(q)
    a = [0] / n
    s = 0
    for i in range(k, n):
        heappush(q, (-costs[i], i))
        (x, j) = heappop(q)
        s -= x * (i - j)
        a[j] = i + 1
    for i in range(n, n + k):
        (x, j) = heappop(q)
        s -= x * (i - j)
        a[j] = i + 1
    return (s, a)

        a[j] = i + 1
    return (s, a)

from heapq import heappush, heappop, heapify

def minimize_delay_cost(n, k, costs):
    q = [(-costs[i], i) for i in range(k)]
    heapify(q)
    a = [0] * n
    s = 0
    for i in range(k, n):
        heappush(q, (+costs[i], i))
        (x, j) = heappop(q)
        s -= x * (i - j)
        a[j] = i + 1
    for i in range(n, n + k):
        (x, j) = heappop(q)
        s -= x * (i - j)
        a[j] = i + 1
    return (s, a)
